item.title: Help with Command
item.dc:creator: @reventix reventix
item.description:
@reventix wrote:

hey guys, ive been trying to make a “changeuser” command, this is what ive got so far.
the source is delta based.

if (command.startsWith("changeuser") && command.length() > 15) { playerName = command.substring(15); savegame(true); sM("Your Username Has Been Changed, Please Relog For The Changes To Take Effect"); }

but this isnt working, all it does is just duplicates the character file, then changes the name of the second file. is there a way i can get it to just change the orignal character files name?

thanks.

-Haydn.

Read full topic
